
```javascript
var FStore = require('runape-fstore');
FStore.initCrypto("some_password");              //Need to init
FStore.setFileName("./Scripts/myStorage.json")   //Optionally set destination. Default ./fstore.json.
FStore.set({"Weather":"Sunny"});                 //Store the object to the encryoted file
console.log(FStore.get().Weather);               //Get and print the Weather
```
